text: Enjoyed stopping by @IndianPueblo for their celebration of Indigenous Peoples Day. As the top Democrat on @IndianCommittee, I'm committed to working to honor the Native cultures that play such an important role in #NM & in our shared history. https://t.co/mdKeLgBCIH

Our nation’s children are particularly vulnerable to negative environmental impacts—that's why the @EPA's Office of Children's Health Protection (OCHP) is so important. My colleagues and I reached out to Admin @EPAAWheeler to press for answers about the future of the office. https://t.co/OArCj5kamh

The deadline to register to vote in New Mexico is TODAY! You can register online, or print out an application—as long as it’s postmarked today. The best part of a democracy is taking part in democracy, so what are you waiting for? https://t.co/4pACfcVFcu

#NM has seen the devastating effects of climate change firsthand. We know it's the greatest threat facing the world today. @IPCC_CH's new report shows more clearly than ever that we don't have time for denial or inaction.  https://t.co/X2swfTu0Ev

Congrats to Abq-born William Nordhaus on the Nobel Prize in Economics, for economic work on climate change. We must tackle this crisis from every angle—proud to see such innovation from one of #NM's own. https://t.co/nd7qAQ5ET0

What are junk insurance plans? It’s in the name. Junk. And they don’t belong anywhere near your health care.
 
I’m voting to undo the Trump administration’s expansion of junk plans that jeopardize coverage for #NM working families & people with pre-existing conditions. https://t.co/8c9Vc9vhYg

94 years after the passage of the Indian Citizenship Act, Native Americans continue to face undemocratic barriers that block their constitutional right to vote.

It's time to pass the Native American Voting Rights Act. 
https://t.co/UXIHiT3BYN

My thoughts are with everyone who is in the path of Hurricane Michael, as well as those who have family and loved ones in the area. I encourage everyone to heed all guidance from federal, state & local officials when it comes to staying safe.

Today, I joined @SenMarkey to sound the alarm on climate change. We need immediate action. We only have 12 years to slash greenhouse gas emissions in half. 12 years to prevent catastrophe.
 
That’s the conclusion of 91 scientists from 40+ countries. https://t.co/ZwYGHZeLra

The @USPS is the most popular federal agency we have. But @POTUS wants to privatize it.

We should work to improve and modernize this outstanding service—not do away with it at the drop of the hat. That’s what the American people want. https://t.co/D5V2fwH49u

Glad the Senate came together to pass the Water Resources Development Act this week. This bill will help improve water management and projects across #NM as we struggle w/climate change & drought—because as we well know in our state: agua es vida. https://t.co/clEzeAjsw3

I'd say every day is National Farmers Day in #NM— but I’m excited we're all celebrating today.
 
Farmers across #NM help feed & fuel the entire nation with chile, pecans, dairy & more. Seeing them in action inspires me to work for & support our entire agricultural community. https://t.co/PeGbCiDrgd

1 in 4 girls experience sexual violence before turning 18. That’s why I’m taking the #GirlsToo pledge. Together we can create a culture of respect for all young people, so they can grow up in a world that values the rights of women & girls.

Proud to have worked on this resolution with @SenAlexander & @MartinHeinrich to pay tribute to nuclear workers in #NM and across the US.
 
We must continue our work to honor those hurt by nuclear activities during the Cold War & ensure they are compensated for their hardship. https://t.co/Fll4Ohbchm

So @SenateMajLdr wants to pay for the $2.3 trillion #GOPTaxScam by cutting middle-class programs like Medicare and Social Security.

We need to fight back— we won’t leave New Mexicans out to dry while @SenateGOP prioritizes giveaways to the 1%. https://t.co/xMsccUKBPU

We’re sending a message to @EPAAWheeler: the @EPA needs to halt their methane standards rollback. They’ve failed to justify killing a vital, common-sense rule that saves money and fights climate change. The public deserves a real say in the matter. https://t.co/uA99dsfI4T

We need the truth. @RealDonaldTrump and the Trump Org. must fully disclose their family business ties to Saudi Arabia. 
 
Our response to the appalling reported killing of Jamal Khashoggi should not be affected by the Trump family’s financial ties to the Saudi gov’t. https://t.co/LCncNJGmVb

Now, @StandingRockST is stuck scrambling so tribal members aren't turned away from the polls on Election Day—an example of how harsh ID laws can stand between eligible Native American voters & the ballot box. And another reason to pass my Native American Voting Rights Act. https://t.co/Cq0pckQUpH

Today I got to visit Homewise, an org that builds quality, affordable homes with rooftop solar in Santa Fe. They strengthen our communities & support working New Mexicans— and I'm proud to work alongside them. https://t.co/adDwUo59vH

We need #CareCorps so seniors can live a full life with support & dignity. @RepLujanGrisham's innovative plan would foster the vital work of caregivers in #NM & across US.
 
Proud to introduce it in the Senate with @MartinHeinrich & @SenAmyKlobuchar. https://t.co/QErviKz8DR

Today I toured 3 local organizations that are working hard to build strong communities and grow good jobs in ABQ’s South Valley. These orgs receive federal funds, which I support in Congress, to help them accomplish their missions.
 
Follow along for highlights from my day.

.@ProtectOurCare is a call to action for countless Americans who are tired of Republican attacks on their health care.

Today, I joined the #CareForceOne Bus Tour in ABQ to fight to protect the health care of working #NM families. We can't afford to go back. https://t.co/h981HikrcW
Joining @forumHSPH with environmental experts to discuss the state of science and policy at the @EPA. WATCH LIVE: https://t.co/fiG02pgmiB

Wow—these young New Mexicans had the incredible chance to talk directly to an astronaut working on @Space_Station! Proud of the teachers who worked hard to make this happen. It's so important to keep finding new ways to get young people engaged with STEM.  https://t.co/2jqOKdRlGP

With all of the challenges we face as a nation, these kinds of divisive policies are not what America needs. Once again, the Trump administration is rolling back hard-fought progress when what our country really needs is to keep moving forward.
https://t.co/OlO2nRGblV

The Trump admin has announced they’re fine using taxpayer $$ to fund “junk plans" that gut coverage of preexisting conditions.
 
Our healthcare system should be focused on covering all Americans, not leaving the vulnerable out in the cold. Let's keep junk plans off the market.

Since I visited the Tornillo tent facility in June, @HHSgov has expanded it to the tune of $100 million/month.

@MartinHeinrich, @RepBetoORourke & I are demanding answers about the child reunification process & conditions under which the Trump admin is holding these children. https://t.co/NUDhrdBJEF

Today in Santa Rosa & Fort Sumner, I got to sit down with hardworking New Mexicans who are key to our rural communities’ businesses and gov’ts. Talking to them was a great reminder of how strong our state is when we all come together to serve the community. https://t.co/EvwQanBvuC

Yet another disturbing development in the child separation disaster. The nonpartisan GAO has put out a new report that shows the dire consequences of the Trump administration’s inhumane policy. https://t.co/EKWN2x0UI5

This politically motivated violence has no place in the United States. We all have a responsibility to condemn these despicable tactics and to set a better example for the nation. I extend my deepest gratitude to law enforcement for their work to ensure public safety.

Agriculture is a critical part of New Mexico’s economy & way of life. Today I sat down with farmers from across eastern New Mexico to talk frankly about the issues impacting them—I look forward to our continued conversations & to finding new ways to support their vital work. https://t.co/dbHdNCmFWJ

Sat down with Cannon AFB leadership to discuss & get answers about how USAF will protect from and clean up possible water contamination from PFOS chemicals in the surrounding area. Later, I met with local community members to hear directly from them about this serious situation.

An honor to address the 10th Annual Cold War Patriots Day of Remembrance today. I will never stop fighting for recognition and compensation for the brave men & women who sacrificed their health for the sake of our nation. https://t.co/6Ul6oqM0W6

Proud to see Kasha-Katuwe Tent Rocks honored as a top spot for visitors to take in #NM's natural beauty. I am dedicated to making sure KKT & all of NM’s monuments get the resources & protection they deserve. https://t.co/PUDaoMTDAU https://t.co/U8J4DW2n4A

Saturday is #NationalDrugTakeBackDay—that means you can bring unwanted medications to locations where @DEAhq officials will dispose of them safely.

It's an easy way to make big difference in fighting the opioid crisis. Find a location near you:  https://t.co/3eHo1e9O1Z https://t.co/AW1MX0ilKk
New Mexicans see right through @POTUS' attempts to politicize our border with fear and division. Our border communities are stronger than these blatant efforts to divide us. https://t.co/Mgu3PUvXoq

Appalled by this act of violence & hatred inside a house of worship, where all deserve to feel safe. Jill & I send our deepest sympathies to all affected.

We can't accept this senseless gun violence as the status quo. And our leaders must end the rhetoric of hate & division.

The Navajo Code Talkers created an unbreakable code that played a major role in the US victory in WWII. They overcame immense hardship to do so, and they are American heroes.
 
Well deserved honor for the Navajo Code Talkers on Albuquerque's Wall of Fame.  https://t.co/5t7N9FvLwA

Starting Thursday, you can sign up for health care or renew a plan through the #ACA at https://t.co/NMhRtuxJFb.

It’s vital that every single New Mexican have access to affordable health care that meets their needs— that's why I'm committed to protecting & strengthening the #ACA. https://t.co/45CMrW4uXs

Today, @POTUS is yet again sowing division, stoking fear & demonizing immigrants— but New Mexico won’t be fooled. If @POTUS tries to sign this unconstitutional order, we'll fight back. https://t.co/PibdvpVsr8

To stay connected, rural NM needs access to high-speed broadband—full stop. Communities can’t get ahead without it.
 
Closing this digital divide is one of my top priorities. That's why I sat down with experts on the ground today: to hear from them what our next steps need to be. https://t.co/6PKQhta1so
Joining @ASNMSU to talk to students about the importance of staying engaged to make a difference. Watch live: https://t.co/ZJcbfqLkQ3

It was inspiring and exciting to meet some of our state’s future leaders this week. I had great conversations with high schoolers and college students from across New Mexico about the importance of getting involved in public service.

Honored to help open Sunland Park's new Wastewater Treatment Plant. Federal, state & local partners collaborated to improve health & well-being of NM communities.
 
I fought for the project's @EPA funding because I'm committed to supporting this kind of development across NM. https://t.co/4IoObsmgE1

Open enrollment kicks off today! You can use https://t.co/p8q0RlM7Xv to compare plans, then sign up or renew at https://t.co/NMhRtuxJFb for coverage that starts on January 1st. https://t.co/qkqy7CrSF1

One thing both parties used to agree on? Protecting the #ArcticRefuge from development. But now the Trump admin & many in the GOP want to drill there, destroying this treasured land.
 
I wrote for @patagonia about why we need to act fast & save the Arctic. https://t.co/SD8g0JtBxA

It takes a Hispanic woman almost two years to make what a white man makes in one year.
 
That’s unacceptable. On #LatinaEqualPayDay, we mark the 11 extra months Hispanic women must work to earn equal pay. We must close the pay gap for women across #NM and the US. https://t.co/esmlctyj1u

During Native American Heritage month, let's celebrate the strength of tribal communities and their contributions to our great nation. As the vice chairman of @IndianCommittee, I am honored to work with and represent Native Americans in Congress every day. https://t.co/SDs4DzxPAD

Tomorrow is Election Day, which means we all have the privilege and responsibility to make our voices heard.

Democracy takes hard work, but it’s also the best way to make sure we have a government of, for, and by the people. https://t.co/rc9HG0o29H

Great to see #SantaFe and #Abq each working hard on #ElectionDay to make sure every voter in the community can get to the polls. Accessibility is key to making democracy happen: https://t.co/rB5a4yGjm6

It's vital everyone make their voice heard on #ElectionDay. It’s equally important to know your rights.
 
If you have any problems casting a ballot, visit https://t.co/wr31QHOcWi or give them a call— rest assured, you've got a lot of people ready to protect your right to vote. https://t.co/gL4gDa7ftg

Yesterday, voters in New Mexico and across this country voted to turn the page – and to stand up for the fundamental values that make our state and our nation strong. We voted to reject the politics of fear, hatred, and division.

Any effort to interfere in the Mueller investigation would cause a constitutional crisis. Unfortunately, we have reason to fear @POTUS firing AG Sessions is an attempt to do just that.

Acting AG Whitaker has publicly criticized the investigation & should recuse himself from it.

102 years ago today, Jeanette Rankin made history as the first woman elected to Congress— so inspiring as we celebrate the record number of women who ran for & won office last night.
 
One thing is for sure: more women in office means an even brighter future for our country. https://t.co/Iu5XuPktks

Today, we all woke up to tragic news: another act of senseless gun violence. Our hearts are with the victims in Thousand Oaks, their families & the brave first responders who lost one of their own.

We can't grow numb to gun violence. It can't be the status quo. We need to act.

Remember—open enrollment for #ACA health plans runs through December 15th. New Mexicans can use https://t.co/p8q0RlM7Xv  to compare plans, then sign up or renew at https://t.co/NMhRtuxJFb.
 
Sign up now for the peace of mind of knowing you'll have coverage starting January 1st. https://t.co/WC5pZpORIU

In honor of Veterans Day, you can visit some of New Mexico’s most beautiful @BLMNational sites free of charge on Sunday. What a great chance for families to explore the outdoor spaces that define our history and our heritage! Find your park at: https://t.co/485B4KCjUA https://t.co/Ij8vEwKgDh

On #VeteransDay, and every day, we honor the men and women who have sacrificed so much to protect our American values.
 
I'm committed to getting every veteran & military family the care they’ve earned— we owe them a great debt, even though it is one we can never fully repay. https://t.co/ODT1OuJhOf

Commemorated #VeteransDay and the 100th anniversary World War I's end at the Santa Fe Veterans Day ceremony today. Military service is deeply ingrained in NM’s culture and history, and it was an honor to celebrate alongside the New Mexicans carrying on that proud legacy. https://t.co/nnplQsnSyH

#NM’s veterans have gone above & beyond to protect what makes this nation great: our freedoms, ideals & commitment to equality no matter your race, creed or gender.

Their devotion is a call to action— to work every day to uphold these same values at home. https://t.co/Qd7m6R2Jd0

On #WorldKindnessDay I want to honor Jennifer Riordan, who died in a tragic plane accident in April. Jennifer's motto was "sharing & caring," a legacy that lives on in her ABQ community.

Let's strive to live like Jennifer & share kindness wherever we can. https://t.co/jUH20bbLud

My heart goes out to everyone affected by the deadly wildfires in California. Grateful to the brave first responders who are risking their own lives to save others and protect communities.

Our nation must come together to support the victims and aid them in their recovery. https://t.co/oOHM5BVUVg

.@NMVoices is doing incredible work to lift up the voices of #NM's most vulnerable children. 

I'm proud that we’re working together to ensure every child gets counted in the #2020Census, so #NM kids have the resources they need to grow up happy & healthy. https://t.co/KYNTBldInx

A new study shows many apps played by children 5 and under include manipulative marketing tactics. Deceptive advertising is wrong, and all the more so when children are the targets.
 
@SenMarkey, @SenBlumenthal and I are making an urgent request for the @FTC to investigate. https://t.co/KA9GJEFSeD

Flavors like ‘tutti frutti’ & ‘creme’ belong in a candy store, not masking chemicals in vape products used by our kids that put them at risk of lifetime nicotine addiction. @US_FDA made the right move curbing e-cigarette sales. I’ll keep pushing for action to protect NM children.

Today, @repbenraylujan introduced the Native American Voting Rights Act in the House, legislation that mirrors my Senate bill.

Congress must pass our bill to ensure Native voters in NM and across Indian Country have equal access to the ballot box and to the democratic process. https://t.co/Su6p9IKl41

An honor to be @SOPHEtweets's 2018 Honorary Fellow, and to partner with such strong advocates for healthy communities. I’ll continue working hard to protect & improve public health for families in New Mexico and across the country. https://t.co/kdxO73O3wT

Great night celebrating Native American Heritage Month & Native youth creative expression through the arts. Thanks to @SoulofNations for their partnership on this event, and all the talented young artists for their wonderful artwork. https://t.co/tNJzTpaDWW

Where you live shouldn’t affect on whether you can get health care. On #NationalRuralHealthDay, let’s renew our commitment to finding new, innovative methods to bring quality health care to rural NM communities.

It’s Friday—that means you still have time to celebrate #RockYourMocs week! To celebrate #RYM2018, I joined @NativeHillStaff to honor their work here in Congress, as well as the integral role Native communities play in New Mexico and across the nation. https://t.co/cCuEk6FB6j

Crimes against Native women often go uninvestigated. Something has to change, and #SavannasAct is a great first step.
 
I'm a proud co-sponsor of this bill that will clarify guidelines for law enforcement responding to Missing & Murdered Indigenous Women. https://t.co/ZJntxmNHUJ

If @POTUS nominates @EPAAWheeler as permanent @EPA Admin, the Senate will finally get to vet his record thoroughly.

I welcome that opportunity, bc what I‘ve seen—from his time as Acting Admin to his work as a coal lobbyist— has not shown he'll put people over polluters. https://t.co/Gm6a7L2ZHT

Honored to join members of the NM Acequia Assoc. today & discuss ways to preserve our water resources, including pushing for a Farm Bill that allows acequias to directly access more federal funding. 

Together we‘ll face our challenges & protect acequias for generations to come. https://t.co/GG6S4iQoIP
